name: Johnny's Deathwish
description:
The "Story"

In 'Johnny's Deathwish' you play as...Johnny, a reclusive junk enthusiast with a genetic predisposition to loving propeller hats no matter how dated they become.

When an item of extreme value and importance is taken from Johnny by a young dictator out on a walk, Johnny dusts off his blaster and sets off on his quest through the treacherous smoggy landscape to get it back...anyone who gets in his way is just collateral...

What can you expect from Johnny's Deathwish?

  • Borderline desk slamming parkour
  • Politically brainwashed, overzealous enemies
  • Traps...a lot of traps.
  • One hit deaths
  • 27 levels (currently)
  • 2 boss fights (currently)
  • A local offline campaign scoreboard (Can you beat us at our own game...hopefully not)

Controls:

Jump - W

Movement - A, D

Shoot - J

Early Access

Johnny is currently in the early stages of its life, with content leading up to the first major boss fight, we shall be updating the game with more content and features as we go, including unlockable outfits, challenge maps and an online scoreboard that will be activated per chapter once we're satisfied with their balance, but local scoreboards will always be there.

Johnny's Deathwish shall be updated to the full version over the course of it's life on Itch.io where is shall also be released on Steam. We hope to gather players on itch that not only want to play the game but will also be integral in giving us further insight into how we can improve the game.
